summary: Allows making salt out of firewood and sea water, only in limited locations. WIP
descriptionHtml:
I tried all salt related mods, neither worked with Frostfall very well (usualy there was too much salt which affected my characters purse). Either by too meta-game solotions or lack of balance.
Mod is not fancy script wise, its more about adding an idea that would improve immersive gaming.

In my attempt i reached for option known to mankind for several thousands years- geting salt from sea water.

As of now this mod adds 2 locations near major coastal cities that allow cooking seawater untill salt remains, only material being firewood, (water being roughly 5 yards away). Exchange ratio is 10 firewood per 1 Salt Pile (will most likely be down to 4 in next update).
All solution are lore friendly and are immersion lead.

Updates will expand on a story of certain nord enterpreuner, expand an added house (it's a placeholder at the moment).

Modified locations are removed to avoid conflicts with most popular location mods, accidentaly one incorporated itself in 1 such mod.
author: Ignatius Artemisius
